thread.title: Lovely stay!! Definitely recommend.
thread.title_full: Lovely stay!! Definitely recommend. - Review of Louison Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mollyanndaisy
title: Lovely stay!! Definitely recommend.
text:
We arrived at the hotel and were greeted by a lovely lady who not only told us we could check in early, but they had upgraded our room for free! Our room was very clean and provided everything we needed. Everything was in a good position and it was all very modern. There was a safe in our room which we took advantage of. Great room service and didn't get disturbed by the noise of any other people staying in the hotel.
Only downside we could think of is the view from our room, which is just a brick wall but this wasn't a problem.
